model_answer: The limited visibility at the snack-break spot is most likely due to option A: they are inside a cloud, which is evidenced by thick fog shrouding the bare trees and limiting sightlines. This is also supported by the description of the environment as having "thick foggy conditions," which would naturally limit visibility. Options B, C, and D do not match the description of the scene provided in the audio.

The group reached a waterfall overlook, and the white patches were sunlit rock faces. The misunderstanding about the white sight in the distance was that someone thought it was snow, but it turned out to be sunlight on rocks.
